software.name: v2.1.0
software.body:
#### Added
- add alert to sample analyses list when no ready virus index is available (#371)
- add several input error messages where previously missing (#404)
- add UI and API functionality for adding email address values to user accounts (#369)
- add UI and API functionality for managing virus schemas (#102)
- add UI and API functionality for selecting schema segments for isolate sequences (#405)
- add notification widget in nav bar (#392)
- alert user to software updates in notification widget (#392)
- allow Pathoscope coverage chart download as PNG (#366)
- disable NuVs and alert user in analyses list when HMM data is not installed (#353)
- fully validate user creation requests (#412)
- prevent analyze requests when no ready virus index is available (#371)
- prevent NuVs analyze requests when no HMM data is available (#353)
- validate password lengths in all password change forms (#421)
- validate sample name fields in creation form (#413)

#### Changed
- change HMM endpoint URLs to make more semantic sense
- don't logout clients authenticated by API key
- move sample group editing from separate API endpoint to edit endpoint
- return `204 No content` from revert history endpoint
- standardize input field error notifications (#404)
- update all instances of danger red color to match brand colors
- update endpoints to match public API docs (#290)

#### Fixed
- fix API key user interface issues
- fix bug  in `QuickAnalyze` modal form
- fix issue in BLAST sagas
- fix unhandled `404` when changing user password in admin UI (#417)

software.name: v2.0.5
software.body:
#### Added
- use validation in subtraction creation API endpoint
- raise specific exception `ClientError` when client files are missing (#393)

#### Fixed
- fix unhideable create user modal (#388)
- fix failing cancellation of waiting jobs (#387)
- fix lagging version displayed in client ui after software update
- fix unhandled `TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not subscriptable` (#382)
- fix unhandled `ValueError: is not valid SemVer string` (#380)

software.name: v2.0.4
software.body:
#### Added
- add dict-like features to `app_settings.Settings` class
- allow configuration and use of a proxy server for outgoing requests
- allow skipping of database checks and settings initialisation
- allow  `paginate()` handler utility function to take `pymongo`-style sort list
- add sample quality chart axis labels
- gracefully show error page when client files missing
- show analysis item placeholder in list in list before analyze request returns
- use `aioinotify ` instead of `inotify` to watch files
- warn user when leaving page while upload in progress

#### Changed
- avoid use of `hasOwnProperty` in `websocket.js`
- clean up `AnalysisDetail` component
- pip upgrade `aiohttp`
- pip upgrade `raven`
- refactor `test_app.py`
- reorganize `organize.py` module

#### Removed
- remove Gitter link from readme

#### Fixed
- ensure that JSON-formatted error responses are returned at all API endpoints
- fix client error when uploading files (#385)
- fix issue when adding isolate in client
- fix floating filter button in pathoscope results
- fix issue with connecting to non-local Mongo host (#373)
- improve rendering of pathoscope coverage charts
- improve sample quality chart print layout
- upgrade distutils `setup.py` and `cx-freeze` to fix build issues

software.name: v2.0.3
software.body:
#### Added
- show progress bar for analysis loading

#### Changed
- performance improvements for web client
- reduction in web client payload size

#### Fixed
- fix ``DocumentToLarge`` exception for large NuVs result sets

software.name: v2.0.2
software.body:
#### Fixed
- prevent unhandled error ``struct.error`` during PathoscopeBowtie
- fixes #314 
- fixes #315

software.name: v2.0.1
software.body:
#### Changed
- prevent creation of samples with no associated files
- block viewing of sample detail when import is not complete

software.name: v2.0.0
software.body:
#### Added
- add ``remove_file`` and ``upload_file`` permission types
- reintroduce and fix sample rights tab in sample detail view

#### Changed
- filter results of sample find API based on requesting users' rights
- make rendering of sample detail views dependent on users' rights to that sample
- rename ``modify_options`` permission to ``modify_settings``

#### Removed
- remove server lifecycle API endpoints

#### Fixed
- completely close file watcher processes on server restart (#306, #183)
- fix brief display of incorrect HMM detail on open
- fix default sample rights settings view
- fix failing error-tracking initialization (Sentry.io)
- fix incorrect numbering in page position indicators
- permission-protect all applicable API endpoints

software.name: v2.0.0-beta.13
software.body:
#### Added
- implement job pagination and searching (#298)

#### Changed
- server optimizations

#### Fixed
- disable click for in-progress analysis items (#299)
- fix authentication for requests authorized by API keys
- fix recurring ``InvalidStateError`` during a bad ``_to_list`` callback (#170)

software.name: v2.0.0-beta.12
software.body:
#### Changed
- don't autofocus on input field in subtraction creation form

#### Fixed
- fix freeze when reverting virus history then navigating back to _Virus_ tab (#287)
- fix pagination issues in file manager views
- fix PathoscopeBowtie failures due to subtraction names containing special characters (#293)
- fix rendering issue in NuVs BLAST result views
- fix subtraction creation pop-up visiblity issues (#294)

software.name: v2.0.0-beta.11
software.body:
#### Added
- allow pagination of files and subtractions views
- allow pagination of files and subtractions API endpoints
- show message when no BLAST hits were found for a NuVs contig sequence

software.name: v2.0.0-beta.10
software.body:
#### Changed
- hide (reserve) read files that are being used in sample creation jobs (resolves #281)
- live refresh sample data as it is updated on the server
- make file removal more effecient
- only return unreserved files at files API endpoints

software.name: v2.0.0-beta.9
software.body:
#### Added
- add ``no_sentry`` command-line argument to disable error reporting
- add report issue button to user context menu
- automatically reload browser after software update
- automatically clean up orphaned subtractions
- update API key and session permissions when user or group data changes

#### Changed
- further improve software release workflow
- hide sample and subtraction creation buttons for non-permitted users
- update some Python dependencies

#### Fixed
- allow removal of subtractions
- fix alignment of HMM page counter
- fix issues with URL being affected by virus creation modal
- fix non-functional sample removal

software.name: v2.0.0-beta.8
software.body:
#### Added
- always fetch latest indexes when indexes viewer loads
- use pagination in indexes viewer

#### Changed
- automatically select a new isolate after it has been added
- make loading status more obvious with spinners in some places

#### Fixed
- fix #263 
- fix #264 
- fix #266
- fix duplicate id error when adding new subtraction (resolves #260)
- fix rendering error for empty viruses
- fix unwanted ``<input />`` focus in settings views
- refresh indexes list after starting new build (resolves #250)

software.name: v2.0.0-beta.7
software.body:
#### Fixed
- fix internal control settings panel
- fix connection issues for clients without ``User-Agent`` headers
- prevent uncaught errors due to websocket ping failure
- resolve #212 
- resolve #258

software.name: v2.0.0-beta.6
software.body:
#### Changed
- get update information from [www.virtool.ca](https://www.virtool.ca) instead of GitHub

#### Fixed
- fix #249
- fix incomplete update issue
- fix missing ``raven`` module exceptions

software.name: v2.0.0-beta.5
software.body:
#### Added
- allow safe re-installation of HMM annotations
- show progress for HMM download

#### Fixed
- clean up extra Python processes on shutdown
- fix perpetual HMM loading state (#251)

software.name: v2.0.0-beta.4
software.body:
#### Added
- implement error tracking in client and on server
- show a **none found** message when no Pathoscope hits match filters
- smooth Pathoscope coverage graphs and reduce network usage

#### Removed
- remove ``write_pid`` command line argument

#### Fixed
- fix Pathoscope hit filtering
- fix settings issue during initial setup

software.name: v2.0.0-beta.3
software.body:
#### Added
- allow direct installation of HMM data from GitHub repository
- reimplement HMM management
- show in-progress message when an importing subtraction item is clicked

#### Changed
- improve appearance of subtraction list items

software.name: v2.0.0-beta.2
software.body:
#### Fixed
- fix release listing issue (betas weren't showing up)

software.body:
- reimplement quick analyze function
- fix missing linked samples in subtraction view and API response
- improve appearance of sample entries
- remove sample multiple selection checkboxes

software.body:
- attempt fix for update install errors
- disable Sentry for now on server
- add ``Location`` response headers to API where applicable (#220)

software.name: v2.0.0-alpha.22
software.body:

- fix settings error during setup

software.body: - automatically rename sample directories for ``v2.0.0``

software.name: v2.0.0-alpha.20
software.body:
- implement error tracking
- attempt to fix software update install process
- fix stuck rebuild index modal #211 
- allow multiple dragged files for upload #214

software.name: v2.0.0-alpha.19
software.body: - Fix ``PathoscopeBowtie`` issue

software.name: v2.0.0-alpha.18
software.body: - fix initial setup problem

software.name: v2.0.0-alpha.17
software.body: - fix issue with software update

software.name: v2.0.0-alpha.16
software.body: - allow changing the default isolate of a virus

software.name: v2.0.0-alpha.15
software.body:
- hide settings nav button except for permitted users
- fix software release sorting
- allow users to choose _stable_, _beta_, or _alpha_ update channels
- add ``software_channel`` setting
- remove ``software_repo`` and ``database_repo`` settings

software.name: v2.0.0-alpha.14
software.body:
- change sample ordering to most recent first
- make permission-dependent rendering of virus views work properly
- fix dead subtraction links
- fix error when reading server version from a folder that is not a git repo

software.name: v2.0.0-alpha.13
software.body:
- remove sample archiving elements from client for now
- remove Nvidia and CUDA components for now as they are not used
- fix identicon rendering
- fix outstanding issues with administrative user management
- add group management features for administrators
- fix routing issue in virus detail view
- reintroduce the watch folder functionality

software.name: v2.0.0-alpha.12

- reimplement NuVs result viewer

- add API management UI to account view
- implement API authorization
- add ``minimum_password_length`` admin setting
- drop Biopython dependency
- increase test coverage

software.name: v2.0.0-alpha.10
software.body:
- add API key management UI
- add account settings UI
- add password change UI

software.name: v2.0.0-alpha.9

software.body: - fix more bad client file paths

software.name: v2.0.0-alpha.6
software.body:
- fix issue where server couldn't find client files in the production build

software.name: v1.8.5
software.body:
- add software tests for `hmm.py` module
- allow upload and import of `*.hmm` profile files and annotations
- remove dropdown menu for checking `*hmm` files
- show _none found_ message when there are no annotations
- fix #90

software.name: v1.8.4
software.body:
- add sample name autofill function
- improve testing coverage

- tweaks to Python users module
- make logging out perform as intended
- strip spaces from new sequence accessions to prevent misbehaviour #37
- only show fully uploaded files in sample creation #77
- cleanup file upload UI #72 
- fix bugs in history UI #79 
- fix Pathoscope coverage rendering #78 
- fix #28 
- fix #73 
- fix #74 
- resolve #85

software.name: v1.8.3
software.body: - merge forgotten pull request #70

software.name: v1.8.3-alpha.1
software.body:
- write git tags (`$TRAVIS_TAG`) to a VERSION file in Travis builds (#67)
- fix unhandled exception on the server when adding a new virus (#69)
- fix job sorting (#57)
- Pathoscope result chart rendering (fixes #64)
- software release listing (#51)
- fix crash in server when `server_ready` setting is `False`

software.name: v1.8.2
software.body:
- fix vertical margin discrepancies in options view `<h5>` elements (#53)
- fix job view sorting (#57)
- fix truncated y-axis labels in Pathoscope result viewer (#64)

software.name: v1.8.1
software.body:
- many miscellaneous fixes
- add Travis CI and CodeCov to project
- fix and improve sample status tags
- add file reservations and fixed importing read file hiding
- added and tested some organize.py module functions

software.name: v1.8.0
software.body:
- Minor bug fixes and code improvement
- More Python unit tests written
- Add host FASTA upload functionality (closes #4)
- Introduce the ability to download and install newer versions of Virtool from GitHub
- Improve the virus import UI and process (closes #3)

software.name: v1.7.6
software.body: Fixes problems caused by enhancements introduced in v1.7.5.

software.name: v1.7.5
software.body:
##### Client
- migrate to EcmaScript6 (#18)
- implement Babel and ESLint in client build process
- switch to Yarn for package management
- introduce read library uploads (#5)
- introduce a new interface for viewing NuVs results

##### Server
- starting building tests using pytest
- restructure dispatcher module to be more testable
- re-implement file watching system to use inotify and function as a Virtool collection

##### Package
- remove 'scripts' directory

software.name: v1.7.4
software.body: Remove the user manual portion of the documentation and move it to [virtool-manual](https://github.com/virtool/virtool-manual).

software.name: v1.7.3
software.body: - Update readme.md

database.name: v0.2.0
database.body:
The first release of the database using the new format.

The release consists of a gzipped JSON file containing:

- the version name (eg. *v0.2.0*)
- a timestamp with the key ``created_at``
- the virus data compatible for import into Virtool v2.0.0+

hmm.name: v0.2.1
hmm.body: - remove some annotations that didn't have corresponding profiles

hmm.name: v0.2.0
hmm.body:
- the first release using TravisCI for building and testing
- merge annotations and profiles into one archive
